title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 474.2 - Persons authorized to sell self-defense spray devices
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 474.2 - Persons authorized to sell self-defense spray devices

State Regulations
(a) The persons authorized to sell
self-defense spray devices are as follows: (1)
dealers in firearms licensed pursuant to

Penal Law, section 400.00; and
(2)
pharmacists licensed pursuant to article 137 of the Education Law. (b) No more than two self-defense
spray devices may be sold at any one time to a single purchaser. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
474.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
